title.rendered: Memory Foam & HR Foam Wedge Pillow – (18x18x11″)

content.rendered:
HIGH RESILIENCE FOAM & MEMORY COMFORT® FOAM: 

Made up of imported materials these wedges have strong HR foam base. These are High Density foam which provides better Cushioning, High resilience and better life of the product. On top of the HR Foam we have a soft layer of Memory Foam. Memory foam has the ability to remember the original shape, it slowly returns back to it after being compressed. It allows our body heat to activate the molding process so that it gives us personalized fit. The climate control features also does not allow the cushion to become hard in winters.

 

BED WEDGE PILLOW: 

The triangle shape of the Pillow helps you correct your posture while using your laptop, Watching TV, Reading a book or just relaxing. It can also prevent you from having back issues with your neck, shoulder and spine which is caused by wrong sitting and sleeping posture.

 

OUTER COVER: 

We provide a premium breathable Mesh fabric as our Outer Cover for the Wedge Pillow. It is Antiallergenic, eco-friendly and Easy to Care. Do not hand wash or use machine, only Spot clean by hand with warm water and mild detergent.

 

WE ASSURE: 

We have tested our Wedge Pillows in lab and have a strict quality check before it is dispatched. Our Wedge Pillows are of high density foam so be assured that it will be your companion for long. We provide One year limited warranty. Please check our Warranty section.

excerpt.rendered: Our Rise & Shine Wedge Pillow will bring you into correct sitting posture and keep you upright while using your laptop, Watching TV, Reading a book or just relaxing. The wedge pillow is rightly elevated to support any position. Can be used in multiple positions while lying down, sitting, and sleeping.
